const response = await client.search({
  query: {
    intervals: {
      my_text: {
        any_of: {
          intervals: [
            {
              match: {
                query: "the big bad wolf",
                ordered: true,
                max_gaps: 0,
              },
            },
            {
              match: {
                query: "the big wolf",
                ordered: true,
                max_gaps: 0,
              },
            },
          ],
        },
      },
    },
  },
});
console.log(response);
